summary: I changed some minor things to make Breezehome more to my liking.
descriptionHtml:
I changed Breezehome to fit my liking without going overboard like some other mods i saw. It may not be immersive to have an anvil in the bedroom but i don't mind.

This mod can cause problems with anything that modifies the Breezehome cell in any way.

This mod adds an enchantment table, anvil, workbench and grindstone to Breezehome. (removing things like chairs and cupboards in the process! see images)

Also it removes the wall in the bedroom. I placed the weapon and shield rack on the opposite wall and replaced the table with a mannequin in the bedroom.

Everything comes with the bedroom upgrade apart from the enchantment table which comes with the loft upgrade.

There shouldn't be any bugs with this mod it's fairly simple. Feel free to leave comments, have fun :D
author: GXFG
